data.text: @AlecStapp We had ivermectin but fizer just wanted to make more money. There is also vitamin D and zinc. Biden and co are racist for passing mandatory jab laws (more black people dont trust the gov medicine). also black people and latinos have more melanin so they need more vit D

@AlecStapp "Not bad I guess. What about environ interventions to reduce spread for the unvaxxed and breakthroughs?"

Ha. No.

"Okay so when people get it, we'll make sure to have therapeutics available for people?"

...

@AlecStapp "We're facing a global pandemic. Test and trace and mitigate?"

Maybe for a few weeks

"Okay.... vaccines?"

Oh yeah, we'll make them quickly, make them free and generally available but that's literally it.
@AlecStapp "Failed state" is steadily becoming less and less of a hyperbole 😬

@TheSkylineTrail The WH doesn't appropriate the funds, Congress does.

It's McConnell + the 50 obstructionists who want America to fail.

@AlecStapp @ATabarrok "...almost certainly breaking some laws in the process. But that is sometimes the only way to get things done today..." We all should be very uncomfortable.  A gov that has to NOT follow to do the will of the people?  How do we diff b/n when we want laws broken and when we don't?
